questions.question: The FTP navigational structure:

choices.answer: can be accessed only through command-line FTP clients.
requires you to click links to access the topics in which you are interes
provides access only to binary files.
is similar to the hierarchical directory structure of a hard drive.

questions.question: Mass-marketing Internet technology that allows you to specify whether you want o be added to an email list server
What is P2P?

choices.answer: A peer-to-peer network on an intranet
A peer-to-peer network on the Internet
A peer-to-peer network on a WAN
A peer-to-peer network on a LAN

questions.question: Open source software development term for the practice of removing restrictions from distribution and use of software
Uploading files to an FTP site requires an FTP client program and:

choices.answer: permission, which is usually provided by the FTP server administrator.

questions.question: A list server can be used to:

choices.answer: replace the network IP address with another, contingent address.
forward emails, announcements, newsletters or advertising to group members
handle incoming and outgoing email for Internet users.

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true of software patents?

choices.answer: The patents granted to one company cannot be bought by another.
Patented technology can typically be used free of charge.

questions.question: Which of the following is open-source software?
To locate failures along the path between your computer and a destination computer:
Short Message Service (SMS) that companies can use to send you promotional messages:
Which of the following enables IT professionals to access and fix computers in remote locations?
When you use command-line FTP on Windows systems:

choices.answer: files are downloaded into the root folder of your hard drive.
files are downloaded into your default browser's cache.
files downloaded into the directory from which you enter the FTP commands
files are downloaded onto your Windows Desktop.

questions.question: Which of the following do end users most commonly download from FTP sites?

choices.answer: Files that have unknown MIME types

questions.question: When you are using remote control services and need to enter the IP address of the system you want to control:
Which of the following can you use to transmit larger files?
What is a listserve group?

choices.answer: users who have been given permission to modify and redistribute software so
A group of users that subscribe to a mailing list
A list of contacts with whom you want to communicate
A group of computers that have both client and server capabilities

questions.question: What is an end-user license agreement (EULA)?

choices.answer: Removes restrictions on the use and distribution of a licensed products
Legal contract between the author of software and the end user
Open-source license that allows you to obtain code & make all the changes
permissive free software license that places restrictions or requirements

questions.question: Virtual Network Computing (VNC) is a program that:

choices.answer: allows you to control a computer at a remote location
allows you to securely transfer files between systems.
groups a collection of computers into a network
provides a secure method of sending email.

questions.question: What occurs in Windows when you try to open a file with an unknown MIME type?

choices.answer: Windows prompts you to define a MIME & associate it with an application
Windows prompts you to open the file as a text-only file.
The file is opened in your default word processor.

questions.question: Which of the following helps IT professionals troubleshoot and solve problems with Internet technologies?
What is created when you extract compressed files from an archive collection that was created by compression utility

choices.answer: The compressed file and a folder containing the extracted files
A folder containing the extracted files
Files that need to be individually decompressed

questions.question: You would use a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) server to:

choices.answer: resolve IP addresses into text-based names.
download popular shareware and open-source freeware.

questions.question: What is a peer-to-peer network?

choices.answer: A network that allows you to control client computers at a remote location
A network in which each computer has both server and client capabilities
A network that offers mass email and texting services
A network that allows you to control the server of a remote network

questions.question: Which of the following should you use when you want to test connectivity between your computer and a destination comp.?
A secure method of transferring files through Secure Shell (SSH) in which you can transfer several files in one session?
What Lesson are we current on?
